utils
Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
  utils.Utilities

public class Utilities
extends Object

This is a collection of static methods and properties (read: global constants) that I was finding useful to include several times, so I unified the access point(s) for them.

Author:
Michael Philippone

Nested Class Summary
static class Utilities.e_ExitCode
          Enum of possible system exit status codes
 
Field Summary
static String[] BoardColors
          PART 01 of the coloring scheme (see RGBColors[] for more information)
Array representing all of the choices for colors on the board
This is used both for both client and server side components, and allows an easy changing of the color choices

static String CRLF
          a String constant that represents a CRLF character sequence (for flushing byte streams)
Signifies an end to a socket communication
static int defaultPort
          This is the unified access point for the commonly used default port number, if it has to be changed, this means we only need to change it in one place.
static int numRequiredPlayers
          This is the unified access point for the commonly used number corresponding to the number of allowable/required players for the game
static String[] pieceNames
          Array representing the names of the player pieces This will allow easy changing of players' names for customizing the experience.

          PART 03 of the coloring scheme (see BoardColors[] for more information)
Array representing all of the RGB color values corresponding to color choices named in BoardColors[]
This is used both for both client and server side components, and allows an easy changing of the color choices
static String[] roomNames
          Array representing the names of the rooms on the board This will allow easy changing of rooms' names for customizing the experience.
static int serverListenerTimeoutMillis
          This is the value--in milliseconds--that the ServerListener will listen with it's accept method before raising a SocketTimeoutException event
60 seconds in a minute, 1000 milliseconds in a second, 5 minutes

Method Summary
static String getTodaysDate()
          A convenience method for constructing a date and time string.
static PrintStream setFileOutput(String fileName)
          Purpose: Utility function for opening a FileOutputStream on a File
Preconditions: None
Postconditions: There is a File object ready to be written
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- TRY to open a FileOutputStream on the File with the name parameter
- - package the FileOutputStream into a PrintStream
- CATCH FileNotFoundException and just return the console PrintStream
END

Constant Field Values

serverListenerTimeoutMillis

public static final int serverListenerTimeoutMillis
This is the value--in milliseconds--that the ServerListener will listen with it's accept method before raising a SocketTimeoutException event
60 seconds in a minute, 1000 milliseconds in a second, 5 minutes

See Also:
Constant Field Values

roomNames

public static String[] roomNames
Array representing the names of the rooms on the board This will allow easy changing of rooms' names for customizing the experience.
Intentionally not final so as to allow re-defining (config file...?)

pieceNames

public static String[] pieceNames
Array representing the names of the player pieces This will allow easy changing of players' names for customizing the experience.
Intentionally not final so as to allow re-defining (config file...?) For example to get to the piece name corresponding to Miss Scarlett you woulkd type:
Utilities.pieceNames[0]

weaponNames

public static String[] weaponNames
Array representing the names of the weapons This will allow easy changing of weapons' names for customizing the experience.
Intentionally not final so as to allow re-defining (config file...?)

PART 01 of the coloring scheme (see RGBColors[] for more information)
Array representing all of the choices for colors on the board
This is used both for both client and server side components, and allows an easy changing of the color choices

PART 03 of the coloring scheme (see BoardColors[] for more information)
Array representing all of the RGB color values corresponding to color choices named in BoardColors[]
This is used both for both client and server side components, and allows an easy changing of the color choices

Method Detail

setFileOutput

public static PrintStream setFileOutput(String fileName)
Purpose: Utility function for opening a FileOutputStream on a File
Preconditions: None
Postconditions: There is a File object ready to be written
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- TRY to open a FileOutputStream on the File with the name parameter
- - package the FileOutputStream into a PrintStream
- CATCH FileNotFoundException and just return the console PrintStream
END

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file to open the PrintStream on
Returns:
the PrintStream opened on a file (success), or the console PrintStream (failure)

getTodaysDate

public static String getTodaysDate()
A convenience method for constructing a date and time string.

Returns:
A string representing the date and time of this method call
